thread.title: Great boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Great boutique hotel - Review of St Martins Lane London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: davidheys
title: Great boutique hotel
text:
Terrific personnel who take care of you. In a great location with good bars and an eclectic restaurant. It's like home from home so we keep going back for TLC and we feel part of a family. One of our all time favourites around the world. Hard to beat
Room Tip: Are you kidding/ See more room tips
